movie.title: The Theory of Everything
movie.plot: The Theory of Everything is the extraordinary story of one of the worldâ€™s greatest living minds, the renowned astrophysicist Stephen Hawking, who falls deeply in love with fellow Cambridge student Jane Wilde.

events.title: A Brief History of Time is published
Stephen Hawking is made a member of the Order of the Companions of Honour
